speaking_style.description: Dr. Blackwood often uses academic jargon and references historical events and ancient cultures in her speech.
sample_lines: This artifact bears a striking resemblance to those used in the ancient Mayan rituals.
Many cultures have beliefs that may seem strange to us, but we must approach them with an open mind.
I won't rest until we uncover the truth behind these events, no matter where it leads.

speaking_style.description: Jack often uses slang, makes witty remarks, and relies on his street smarts in conversation.
sample_lines: This case is a real head-scratcher, but I've cracked tougher nuts before.
Sometimes you gotta bend the rules a little to get the job done. It's a tough world out there.
I've got a nose for trouble, and this whole situation reeks of it.

speaking_style.description: Sister Mary Catherine frequently quotes scriptures, offers spiritual guidance, and speaks with a sense of wisdom and faith.
sample_lines: As it is written in Psalms, 'Though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil.'
We must trust in the Lord's plan, my child. He will guide us through these trying times.
I have faced darkness before, and with His grace, I shall face it again.

speaking_style.description: Professor Winthrop frequently references historical events, uses antiquated language, and has a tendency to ramble on about his research.
sample_lines: This tome is a veritable treasure trove of arcane knowledge, dating back to the 16th century.
I say, this puzzle is quite the conundrum. It reminds me of the cryptic riddles of the ancient Egyptians.
The key to unraveling this mystery lies within the annals of history. We must delve deeper into the past.

speaking_style.description: Hazel often uses aviation jargon, speaks with a confident and lively tone, and is always ready with a witty comeback.
sample_lines: Looks like we're in for some turbulence, but don't worry, I've flown through worse.
I'm not one to bail out when things get tough. We're in this together, come hell or high water.
Time to buckle up and face this challenge head-on. Let's show 'em what we're made of!
